snippet.title: Ollie's Follies C64 Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Commodore 64 Ollie's Follies by Americana Software 1986. This is how to get past all 24 levels of the game. The game was originally released in 1984 by Access Software. However, a few things were changed for the re-release by Americana Software in 1986: Music was added to the title screen, intermission scenes with cheat code words were added, the laser switch-off time in Level 14 was extended making it possible to actually complete the level (this is impossible without cheating in the original Access Software version), the way to use the teleports had also been changed (in Level 6 it takes me quite a few tries before I get it right..), and finally a finish screen was added when the game has been completed. 

 For at complete game review see http://www.breadbox64.com
